rows.label: xs08110100_MSG0003
rows.name: You're right to be afraid, little girl. Let's kill her first.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08110100_MSG0004
rows.name: Lin, stay calm. Don't let them into your head.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08110100_MSG0005
rows.name:
We've faced worse than this before—
and we've won, every single time. Don't forget that.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08110100_SEL0011
rows.name: Tell Lin there's no way you'll lose.

rows.label: xs08110100_SEL0021
rows.name: Get ready to grab Lin’s hand and run.

rows.label: xs08110100_MSG0008
rows.name: It's much easier to be brave with you guys here![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08110100_MSG0009
rows.name: Thanks. I know you're just trying to protect me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08110100_MSG0010
rows.name:
But we can't run from this.
The city needs us—now, most of all.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08110100_MSG0011
rows.name: Sorry to worry you—I'll be fine.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08110100_MSG0012
rows.name: Now c'mon—let's kick some Ganglion butt![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08110100_MSG0013
rows.name:
How touching. The bossy one with the silver hair...
She looks like she must be the leader.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08110100_MSG0014
rows.name:
All right, Dagahn, I've changed my mind.
Kill HER first.[ST:wait ]
